attributes.title: Live Life Based On Cosmic Truths Of Basic Ingredients Of Life - Birth, Death, Universe, God, Society
attributes.description:
10 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S DIRECT MESSAGE FROM KAILASA:
*UNDERSTAND THE COSMIC PRINCIPLES FROM KAILASA ABOUT BIRTH, DEATH, LIFE, UNIVERSE, GOD, HUMAN SOCIETY - WHICH ARE ALL THE BASIC INGREDIENTS OF YOUR LIFE. FUNCTION FROM THAT UNDERSTANDING; YOU WILL HAVE COSMIC CONSCIOUSNESS HAPPENING IN YOU. THIS IS TODAY'S MESSAGE.

*UNDERSTAND ABOUT LIFE FROM COSMOS, AS COSMOS REVEALS ABOUT LIFE, NOT AS THE FOOLISH MATERIALISTIC BRAINWASHING FELLOWS ARE TRYING TO TEACH YOU.

*THE CHRONIC CAPITALISTS ARE TRYING TO BRAINWASH YOU TO THINK LIFE IS ALL ABOUT THE COMFORT, LUXURY THAT YOU HAVE, BECAUSE THEY WANT TO MAKE YOU THEIR CUSTOMER. THE ONLY UTILITY YOU HAVE FOR THEM IS TO BUY FROM THEM. THEY SAY, “EARN, EARN, EARN, AND COME AND GIVE TO US TO BUY A PAIR OF JEANS, THEN A HOUSE, AND A CAR….” THEN, WORK YOUR WHOLE LIFE TO PAY THE MORTGAGE OF YOUR HOME. YOU ARE A MACHINE TO PAY THEIR BILLS. THEY TEACH YOU TO BE THAT.

*EACH ONE TEACHES ABOUT LIFE THE WAY THEY CAN EXPLOIT YOU. BUT COSMOS TEACHES ABOUT LIFE TO YOU “AS IT IS”.

*I HAVE SEEN THE DELUSION OF THE PEOPLE: FEAR OF LIVING ORGANISED, THEY WILL EVEN COMMIT SUICIDE BUT THEY DON’T WANT TO LIVE IN AN ORGANISED WAY.

*THE WHOLE COSMOS IS IN SUCH BEAUTIFUL ORDER, EVEN THE CHAOS IS IN A VERY BEAUTIFUL ORDER.

*IF YOU LEARN THAT ORDER, YOU WILL UNDERSTAND LIFE IS SUCH A BEAUTIFUL ORDER.

*IF YOU WAKE UP IN THE MORNING AND REMEMBER PARAMASHIVA, YOUR WHOLE BODY, MIND, CONSCIOUSNESS, EMOTIONS, WILL WAKE UP! IT IS EQUIVALENT TO HAVING 25 COFFEES. REMEMBERING HIS 25 FACES, 50 HANDS, 75 EYES….AND PRAYING, “MAHADEVA! MANIFEST IN ME…!” IS EQUIVALENT TO HAVE 25 COFFEES. YOU WILL BECOME HYPERACTIVE!

*THE KIDS, IF YOU GIVE THEM CHOCOLATE, THEY WILL BECOME HYPERACTIVE. I HAVE SEEN RANJANI’S AND KAILASH JNANAM’S KIDS DO THAT. THEY WILL RUN AROUND THE WHOLE ASHRAM! NOW, SKANDAMATA IS DOING THAT JOB EVEN WITHOUT TAKING CHOCOLATE! REMEMBERING SHE IS SUBRAHMANYA, SHE RUNS AROUND! I AM VERY HAPPY!

*REMEMBER PARAMASHIVA AND HAVE SUGAR RUSH. YOUR WHOLE DAY WILL BE IN SUCH ORDER.

*MORNING, YOUR SUGAR RUSH SHOULD BE REMEMBERING MAHADEVA WITH 25 HEADS, 50 HANDS AND 75 EYES!

*FROM THE TIME I KNOW ME, MY SUGAR RUSH IS ARUNACHALA’S DARSHAN! WHEN I LOOK BACK I FEEL I HAVE NOT CHANGED AT ALL!

*THIS DEFINITION IS THE MOST APT DEFINITION FOR ME: “SMALL BUT CONTINUOUS UNBROKEN LINEAGE OF ENLIGHTENED MASTERS FORM REMOTE SOUTH INDIAN VILLAGE TIRUVANNAMALAI GONE RIGHT - IS NITHYANANDA!”

*I CAN REPEAT THIS DEFINITION ANY NUMBER OF TIMES!

*WHETHER BHASMA FILLED FOREHEAD OR RUDRAKSHA FILLED BODY OR THE WAY I SIT IN PADMASANA OR THE CLOTH UPTO THE KNEE...IF YOU SEE MY YOGA PATTABHISHEKAM PHOTO OF 1994, I DON'T FEEL I HAVE CHANGED AT ALL IN THE LAST 26 YEARS! IN THOSE DAYS WHEN I WAKE UP, THE FIRST THING I SEE IS ARUNACHALA. NOW I AM ALREADY IN SAMADHI. WHEN I OPEN MY EYES, I FEEL I AM PARAMASHIVA! THAT'S IT. I DON'T FEEL ANY DIFFERENCE

*”KAILASA” IS NOTHING BUT ARUNACHALA GONE RIGHT! THAT’S ALL! IT IS REVIVING ARUNACHALA ALL OVER THE WORLD!

*LEARN ABOUT DEATH FROM COSMOS, WHO KNOWS YOU BEFORE YOUR DEATH, DURING DEATH, AFTER YOUR DEATH AND WHAT IS THE DEATH PROCESS.

*LEARN EVERYTHING FROM COSMOS. BEAUTIFULLY COSMOS HAS REVEALED ALL THESE SACRED TRUTHS IN UPANISHAD, VEDAS AND AGAMAS.

*WHEN YOU LEARN, UNDERSTAND, INTRANALISE - SHRAVANA, MANANA, NIDIDHYASANA - LISTENING, INTERNALISING, MANIFESTING - THESE GREAT TRUTHS FROM COSMOS, YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS BECOMES ENLIGHTENED CONSCIOUSNESS. THEN YOU JUST KNOW LIFE AS IT SHOULD BE KNOWN.

*YESTERDAY I SAW SO MANY POSTS ABOUT, “ONLY NOW WE ARE UNDERSTANDING KRISHNA’S SACRIFICE!”

*EVEN KRISHNA’S RASA LEELA IS AN EXTREME SACRIFICE. IT IS NOT WOMANISING OR POLYGAMUS AS THESE FELLOWS DISTORT IT TO BE. THEY ARE THE ILLEGITIMATE SONS OF ‘3M’ AND THEN DISTORT KRISHNA’S AND RAMA’S LIFE AND ABUSE HINDUS. THEY MAKE HINDUS FEEL DISRESPECT TO THEIR TRADITION AND CIVILIZATION.

*FIRST OF ALL THE RASA LEELA HAPPENED WHEN KRISHNA WAS A KID, NOT EVEN WHEN HE WAS 10 YEARS OLD, WHEN HE WAS IN BRINDAVAN. BEFORE 10, HE ALREADY MOVED TO MATHURA.

*LET ME EXPLAIN ABOUT KRISHNA AND INDUCE MORE LOVE, BHAKTI, DEVOTION IN YOU AND LET YOU ALL MANIFEST KRISHNA AND ENJOY AND CELEBRATE KRISHNA. WHY WASTE TIME ON KAMSAS, NARAKASURAS AND SISUPALAS. LET THEM LIVE THEIR LIFE, LET US LIVE OUR LIFE!

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4210360932385058
